# Looking to take action?

There are many ways to support the Youth Employment Program's philosophy and help your local area, youth, and community. From taking action yourself, to enabling others or our crew, there's always value you can \[provide/give] to help out.

# \[Call to action]

## Have a skill or trade to share?

Partner with YEP to give \[work/skills] to our local youth. Contact us to provide!

\[Technical Career Training] \<-- link

## Have extra time on your hands?

Consider volunteering some time to contribute to our projects or help mentor our crews

\[Volunteer] \<-- link

## Have funding for our crews?

There are multiple ways to charitably gift or fund our program as a whole or individual crew members

\[Give || Donate]

# Looking for another avenue to help?

\[Contact us and get in touch!] (footer contact info)

# Career Technical Training

The Youth Employment Program offers a number of different programs and paths to local youth to further their professional careers, get them on track for employment through our partners, and overall development knowledge-base and skills

\[ ] Get list of al trainings and pipelines.

*  First Aid/AED
* Welding
* Sawyer Training
* Graphic Design
* GIS
* Surveying
* Recreation & Resource Management
* Small Stream Restoration
* Ecology

# Sponsor Youth

Provide either funding for crew paychecks, or gift goods/services to keep our crews working like gloves, boots, food, or \[physical/occupational] \[therapy/facilities]

Contract us for gear, goods, and service contributions or fund through our charitable donation page\[direct link to storefront tagged donate].

# Volunteer

YEP runs volunteer day(s) each season
